languages.text:
"...Нет, ведь предал бы он память о братьях своих.
Имя Зловещего воя не будет забыто,
Пока не падет самый последний из них".

"...No, for he would betray
his brothers' memory.
The name of the Baleful Howl
would not be forgotten,
while the last had not yet fallen."
languages.original_text:
"...Нет, ведь предал бы он память о братьях своих.
Имя Зловещего воя не будет забыто,
Пока не падет самый последний из них".

traits.locale_text:
"...No, for he would betray
his brothers' memory.
The name of the Famehungry
would not be forgotten,
while the last had not yet fallen."

"...No, for he would betray
his brothers' memory.
The name of the Famehungry
would not be forgotten,
while the last had not yet fallen."

"...Нет, ведь предал бы он память о братьях своих.
Имя Голодных до славы не будет забыто,
Пока не падет самый последний из них".

"...No, for he would betray
his brothers' memory.
The name of the Baleful Howl
would not be forgotten,
while the last had not yet fallen."

languages.text:
「…否、彼は兄弟の記憶を
裏切ることになるからだ。
破滅の咆哮の名は
最後のひとりが倒れるまでは
忘れ去られることはない」
languages.original_text:
"...No, for he would betray
his brothers' memory.
The name of the Baleful Howl
would not be forgotten,
while the last had not yet fallen."

traits.locale_text:
「…否、彼は兄弟の記憶を
裏切ることになるからだ。
誉れある飢えの名は
最後のひとりが倒れるまでは
忘れ去られることはない」

languages.text:
“……不，这不啻于，
背叛了兄弟们的记忆。
只要仍有一人还未倒下，
怒嚎者的名号，
就永远不会被遗忘。”
languages.original_text:
"...No, for he would betray
his brothers' memory.
The name of the Baleful Howl
would not be forgotten,
while the last had not yet fallen."

traits.locale_text:
“……不，这不啻于，
背叛了兄弟们的记忆。
只要仍有一人还未倒下，
渴名者的名号，
就永远不会被遗忘。”

languages.text:
« Non, car il trahirait ainsi
le souvenir de ses frères.
Le nom des Hurleurs sanguinaires
ne sera pas oublié,
tant que l'un d'eux
continuera le combat. »
languages.original_text:
"...No, for he would betray
his brothers' memory.
The name of the Baleful Howl
would not be forgotten,
while the last had not yet fallen."

traits.locale_text:
« Non, car il trahirait ainsi
le souvenir de ses frères.
Le nom des Dévoreurs de gloire
ne sera pas oublié,
tant que l'un d'eux
continuera le combat. »

languages.text:
«... No, pues nunca traicionaría
de sus hermanos el recuerdo.
El nombre del Aullido Torvo
en olvido jamás caería
mientras el último lobo con vida siguiera».
languages.original_text:
"...No, for he would betray
his brothers' memory.
The name of the Baleful Howl
would not be forgotten,
while the last had not yet fallen."

traits.locale_text:
«... No, pues nunca traicionaría
de sus hermanos el recuerdo.
El nombre de los Hambrientos de Fama
en olvido jamás caería
mientras el último lobo con vida siguiera».

languages.text:
"... Nein, denn er würde das Andenken
seiner Brüder verraten.
Der Name der Baleful Howl
würde nicht vergessen werden,
während die Letzten noch nicht gefallen waren."
languages.original_text:
"...No, for he would betray
his brothers' memory.
The name of the Baleful Howl
would not be forgotten,
while the last had not yet fallen."

traits.locale_text:
"... Nein, denn er würde das Andenken
seiner Brüder verraten.
Der Name der Famehungry
würde nicht vergessen werden,
während die Letzten noch nicht gefallen waren."

languages.text:
"Hayır, yoksa kardeşlerinin
Anısına ihanet eder.
Uğursuz Uluma ismi,
En sonuncuları düşene dek
Unutulmayacaktır."
languages.original_text:
"...No, for he would betray
his brothers' memory.
The name of the Baleful Howl
would not be forgotten,
while the last had not yet fallen."

traits.locale_text:
"Hayır, yoksa
kardeşlerinin anısına ihanet eder.
Uğursuz Uluma ismi,
en sonuncuları düşene kadar
unutulmayacak."
